features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Enable users to securely sign in and manage their sessions.

tasks.title: Implement Login Page UI
tasks.description: Create the login page using the LoginForm component with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: app/login/page.tsx; Use controlled components for form fields; Ensure accessibility and form validation.

tasks.title: Build LoginForm Component
tasks.description: Develop the LoginForm component to capture user credentials and trigger authentication.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: components/LoginForm.tsx; Use React hooks for form state; Integrate with Context API for authentication state.

tasks.title: Create Authentication API Route
tasks.description: Set up Next.js API route to handle user login requests and password verification.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: app/api/users/route.ts (POST); Use bcrypt for password hash verification; Return JWT or session token.

tasks.title: Context API for Auth State
tasks.description: Implement global authentication state using React Context API.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create AuthContext; Provide user object and login/logout methods; Wrap app in AuthProvider.

features.name: User Management
features.description: Allow creation and retrieval of user accounts.

tasks.title: Define User Entity
tasks.description: Model the User entity with required fields.
tasks.technicalNotes: Fields: id, email, name, passwordHash; Use TypeScript interfaces/types.

tasks.title: Create Users API Route
tasks.description: Implement GET and POST handlers for /api/users.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: app/api/users/route.ts; GET returns all users; POST creates a new user with hashed password.

tasks.title: In-Memory User Store
tasks.description: Set up an in-memory data store for user data.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use a module-scoped variable or singleton pattern; Not persistent across server restarts.

features.name: AI Insights & Analytics
features.description: Generate, store, and display AI-generated insights for users.

tasks.title: Define Insight Entity
tasks.description: Model the Insight entity with required fields.
tasks.technicalNotes: Fields: id, userId, content, createdAt; Use TypeScript interfaces/types.

tasks.title: Create Insights API Route
tasks.description: Implement GET and POST handlers for /api/insights.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: app/api/insights/route.ts; GET returns insights for authenticated user; POST creates new insight.

tasks.title: In-Memory Insight Store
tasks.description: Set up an in-memory data store for insights.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use a module-scoped variable or singleton pattern; Not persistent across server restarts.

tasks.title: AI Insight Generation Logic
